item.title: This needs a script
item.description: I was writing this morning about the benefits of automation and that even the most simple script is a method of automation. Ironically enough I finished parsing through a spreadsheet in preparation of a meeting and when I finished making copies; a new report was sent to me. This needs a script.

item.title: hacked automation
item.description: rmarkdown::render(“file.name”) The line of code above has dramatically improved my workflow. The render function helped me reach the goal of creating an automated system of creating a status report and share data in a more efficient manner.
